thread.title: Top recruit, North Carolina native Harry Giles won't take official visit to UNC
thread.title_full: Top recruit, North Carolina native Harry Giles won't take official visit to UNC

author: Dan Lyons
title: Top recruit, North Carolina native Harry Giles won't take official visit to UNC
text:
Top recruit, North Carolina native Harry Giles won't take official visit to UNC College Spun 2 days ago Dan Lyons © USA TODAY Sports Mar 11, 2015; Greensboro, NC, USA; North Carolina Tar Heels head coach Roy Williams reacts in the second half. The Tar Heels defeated the Eagles 81-63 in the second round at Greensboro Coliseum. Mandatory Credit: Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports On July 21, five-star power forward Harry Giles, the No. 2 player in the nation , announced a top five of Duke, Kansas, Kentucky, North Carolina, and Wake Forest. According to 247Sports , he took his official visit to Wake Forest on September 18, visited Kansas on October 9, and spent this weekend at Kentucky for Big Blue Madness . He has a Duke visit planned for Halloween weekend. According to SNY’s Adam Zagoria, Giles will not be taking a visit to UNC.
AdChoices
Harry Giles won't visit North Carolina, per @ohacoachsmith , so Duke will be the last visit over Halloween.
— Adam Zagoria (@AdamZagoria) October 18, 2015
Giles is a North Carolina native, so there’s a chance he has already been to Chapel Hill and knows what UNC has to offer. The fact that he has gone to, or will go to every other school in his top five, including locals Duke and Wake Forest, has to be disconcerting for Tar Heels fans.
